title: The Tiffany Window at the Art Institute of Chicago Postcard Book
description:
Celebrate the Art Institute’s spectacular memorial window designed by Agnes F. Northrop and made by Tiffany Studios in 1917 through this selection of 31 images. The Tiffany Window is a pinnacle achievement in the medium of stained glass.

  • Dimensions: 6.5 x 4.75 in.
  • 31 postcards
